categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Skolitz was an Imperial Navy Captain serving in the faction loyal to the usurper Emperor Darth Krayt. He was also an aide to Moff and Grand Admiral Rulf Yage.

When the crew of the Mynock tried to rescue Cade Skywalker from the Temple of the Sith and was attacked by Skull Squadron, Captain Skolitz communicated Moff Yage's order to call off the attack, as Yage was following instructions from Grand Moff Morlish Veed.
